text.title: Find Your Inner Strength
text.head: Find Your Inner Strength
text.p: This article is n't about being strong and defending yourself . It 's about showing your INNER strength which means emotion and power . NOT FINISHED YET !
text.head: Steps
Overcoming Self-Destructive Behaviour

list.item: Learn to love how you are . If someone does n't like you , then who cares ? You are YOU and you should love yourself more and more each day . You do n't have to be similar to everyone . Being different is the most important thing of all .
To be very healthy , DO NOT smoke . Smoking is so bad for your health , and can lead to lung cancer and loss/shortage of life . It 's very hard to stop when you 've already started .

When you eat too much junk food , your body may not like it . Soon you may become fatter and no one likes that ! To be slim eat fruit , vegetables , and meat . Anything like chocolate , cake , and chips are bad for your health , and can damage your body . Refined sugars and saturated fats are health disasters waiting to happen !

Try to avoid getting sick . If you see someone who has caught a cold , do n't get too close to them . Try to avoid getting cancer or breaking a leg , and be careful where you head ! Falling down the stairs , on the road , dropping from a building . Be SO careful !

Lastly , if someone you hate or a bully tries to hurt you in some way , STAY AWAY . If you are so close to them , then act nice to them . Bullies hate when you do that . If nothing works , try a compliment . If it still wo n't work , then you must defend yourself with your INNER strength and FAITH .

text.head: Fighting Health Challenges

list.item: Take very good care of your health . There are many kind of causes out there causing injury , so look out for them !
If you SO BADLY want to lose wait , and feel stronger , go on health shows and challenges . Usually people drop half their weight or more .
Some medicine can help your muscles . Also , milk can help your muscles grow . But , inner strength is when your emotions help you become strong . It happens !
Everyone knows drugs are bad for you , but medical drugs are ok . They help your body and can clear yourself from cancer .

Maybe you could stop the health challenges and diets and stuff . Instead , be yourself . Strength is n't everything , and soon one day you may not be strong , but you wo n't turn into a bully . Sometimes things like this happen , so watch out !

text.head: Powering Through Loss

list.item: When a very well loved person dies , it is hard not to cry . But , to help you power on and stop worrying , you could maybe talk to a friend or family member .
Another thing to do is to write about it and express your feelings in journals and diaries . Soon , it wo n't sound so bad , and you wo n't be teared up in agony anymore .

If you are still crying and do n't know what to do , try remembering all your cherished moments with that particular person in your life . You will always remember the person who helped you get through life , be happy after tears , and make you feel good about yourself .
Sharing your story with others can help you feel better . Talking about it to a teacher , friends , and your parents can help you soften those tears .

If all else fails , and you are still teared up in sadness , pretend that he/she is still living . Daydream/dream/act out plays and stories of how he/she is still living and as good as ever . Then , he/she would n't be in his/her grave , after all ! He/she will be with you only .

text.head: Moving Past Disabilities

list.item:
There are many ways to show people that you are in pain . I will tell you how to feel better about the way that you are in pain and misfortune . Some painful stuff include :
Wheelchair
Crutches
Blood
Crying

Wheelchairs are used for people who ca n't walk anymore . If you ca n't walk and you are in a wheelchair , people may stare at you . If you ca n't ride a wheelchair well , get a best friend or family member to help you wheel along .

People use crutches when they can walk , but it hurts . If crutches is the way to go , do n't feel too bad . If you find it hard to hop for so long , get someone to help you while you are hopping . Maybe , they can help you hop on your foot . Hold you while you hop , so you do n't fall over .

Blood is painful , and can be red , but also maroon . To fix blood pouring down your legs or arms or stuff , get a bandage or a band-aid ( bandage would be better ) and wrap it around where your blood is . Remember to change your bandage once a day or it may stick there forever ! Soon , when it does n't hurt anymore , get rid of the bandages , and you 're fine !

Crying can tell that something is wrong . Everyone cries sometime , and crying can bring lots of attention . Feeling lost ? Broke your leg ? Your life is horrible ? Many people will usually come to your rescue . And when you tell them about your pain , they will almost always help . Crying is nothing to be ashamed of , and can save your life sometimes !

text.head: Accepting the New Normal

list.item: Being different is important , and no one is the same . Blonde , brunette , red , black , green , purple , grey , white hair . Blue , green , yellow , grey , orange , hazel eyes . You could have green hair , white eyes , and wear crazy clothes , and you could be known as beautiful . It does n't matter what you where , as long as it 's something !
